```{r}
fname=system("ls -1 as12-75S*",intern=T)
dat=NULL

for (i in fname) dat=rbind(dat,read.csv(i,head=F))
colnames(dat) <-c('sub','blk','blkType','trl',
                  'dur','isLet','oriT','oriC',
                  'resp','rt','acc')
acc= as.integer(as.factor(dat$acc))
```

```{r}
datA=dat[dat$blk>1,]
crit=tapply(datA$dur,list(datA$sub,datA$blkType),mean)
plot(crit,pch=19,col='blue',ylim=c(0,13),xlim=c(0,13),
     xlab="Congruent (Frames @ 75hz)",
     ylab="Incongruent (Frames @75hz)")
abline(lm(crit[,2]~crit[,1]))
abline(0,1)
abline(0,2)
```
